channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How bitcoin has historically responded to bear markets
item.description: Historically, bitcoin entering a bear market has been great buying opportunity. But not always.

item.title: ‘She’ll probably marry her current boyfriend’: Should I give my daughter my $300K house — or gift her the cash to buy it?
Nomura strategist warned the market selloff was coming . Here are the forces he says are taking stocks down.
item.description: Leveraged ETFs, and a highly unbalanced market have been among the forces bubbling away at this market for weeks, a highly respected strategist notes.

item.title: Wall Street’s on edge. These are the levels that stocks must not violate, says Fundstrat
item.description: Poor market breadth remains a concern according to Mark Newton

item.title: My late husband’s son is listed as beneficiary on his IRAs. Where does that leave me?
item.description: “My husband’s son said he doesn’t want any part of the IRAs or the insurance policies.”

item.title: This industrial giant is emerging as a big AI play, says Wells Fargo
item.description: The bank initiated shares of the agricultural equipment manufacturer with an overweight rating.

item.title: Caterpillar is on fire this year. A look at what’s driving the industrial giant — and where it could go from here
item.description: While some analysts believe that Caterpillar stock is more likely to plateau from here, others are calling for a significant pullback.

item.title: These stocks reporting earnings next week, including Nvidia, have histories of beating Wall Street's expectations
item.description: Nvidia and other technology firms that report earnings next week have often beaten the Street's estimates and made stock gains on their earnings days.

item.title: This oil stock finally has technical momentum on its side and is 'one of the best in the market,' Josh Brown says
item.description: Brown said Thursday on CNBC's 'Halftime Report' that Exxon could soon test a breakout level in the $125 area.
